rows.label: qev060902_MSG0001
rows.name:
...What? Are you going to tell me that this CLEARLY
suspicious xeno is actually innocent?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_JNK0010
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev060902_SEL0011
rows.name: Assert that Shiraton is not the perpetrator.

rows.label: qev060902_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev060902_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask to hear an account of what happened.

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0002
rows.name:
Look, I can respect that you're looking out for your
friend, but I can't just let him go until I see some proof
that he's innocent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0003
rows.name: ...Wait, you're asking if I have proof that he's NOT?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0004
rows.name:
I sure do—it's called my gut! I've got a detective's
instincts, and they're screaming that this guy's
playing dirty pool.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0005
rows.name: Oh what? You playing detective now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0006
rows.name:
Though I can respect a hunger to get at the truth,
so I'll make an exception and fill you in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0007
rows.name:
Late last night, the perp smashed a window of one of
the big mansions in the ritzy part of town up ahead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0008
rows.name:
He slipped inside without waking the residents
and stole a priceless jewel. But on his way out,
he made one fatal mistake...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0009
rows.name:
He stepped on the tail of their sleeping dog!
Little guy started barking up a storm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0010
rows.name:
That woke the owners, and they called the Mediators.
That's where I came in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0011
rows.name:
As soon as I get here, I find this mook skulking about
in a freakin' mask![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0012
rows.name:
I mean, come on—he couldn't BE more obvious!
This has gotta be the guy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_JNK0030
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev060902_SEL0031
rows.name: Assert that Shiraton is not the perpetrator.

rows.label: qev060902_JNK0040
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev060902_SEL0041
rows.name: Admit that Shiraton may well be the thief.

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0013
rows.name:
Look, I can respect that you're looking out for your
friend, but I can't just let him go until I see some proof
that he's innocent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0014
rows.name:
...Huh? You didn't hear anything in my account that
proves he's guilty? And that it's on ME to show
evidence of his guilt?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0015
rows.name:
Well, all right then, [ST:gender p1=mister p2=missy ]! I'll show you evidence!
Let's see... Evidence... Eeeeevidence...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0016
rows.name:
Rgh, screw this noise! My gut is evidence enough!
I've got a detective's instincts, and they're screaming
that this guy's playing dirty pool![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0017
rows.name:
...Unreliable? What? I'll have you know I was an ace
detective back on Earth—New York's finest, in fact.
This gut is CRAZY reliable![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0018
rows.name:
...Huh? But how do you figure that? *fsssh*
There wasn't a whit of evidence in that account.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0019
rows.name: *fsssh* ...What do you mean, it just "feels right"?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0020
rows.name:
Unbelievable! I never would have thought you were the
same sort of human as this Tracey woman. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0021
rows.name: A-HA! That sounds like guilt to me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0022
rows.name:
You've got nowhere to run now, criminal.
So confess and maybe it'll go easy on you.
Don't make me be the bad cop![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0023
rows.name:
*fsssh* Wait a moment!
The shock of all this just jarred my memory! [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0024
rows.name:
I saw a car depart the city from the east gate at
breakneck speed around the time of the robbery you
cite. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0025
rows.name:
*fsssh* At the rate it was going, it seemed ready to
head all the way to Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0026
rows.name:
Please at least investigate that one thing before you
come to any conclusions about me. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0027
rows.name:
I'm not even mad about being betrayed. *fsssh*
Just give me this one last chance to prove myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0028
rows.name:
Ugh, this is useless. *fsssh*
She's beyond reason.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0029
rows.name:
At this rate, there's no way to convince her shy of
dragging the real culprit in front of her. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_JNK0050
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev060902_SEL0051
rows.name:
Ask Shiraton if he saw anything
suspicious around that time.

rows.label: qev060902_JNK0060
rows.name: Sympathize

rows.label: qev060902_SEL0061
rows.name: Offer your condolences for having crossed Tracey's path.

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0030
rows.name:
*fsssh* Hmm, a good point. It's possible I passed them
while on my collection route.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0031
rows.name:
You'd make a fine detective, my friend. *fsssh*
Certainly a far cry better than this one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0032
rows.name:
Hmm, someone suspicious... *fsssh*
Someone suspicious...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0033
rows.name:
*fsssh* You are kind as ever. I have to remind myself
that you humans are fundamentally good-hearted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0034
rows.name:
I must have faith that if presented with conclusive
evidence of my innocence, this woman will come to
her senses as well. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0035
rows.name: Evidence... *fsssh* There must be some evidence...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0036
rows.name:
*fsssh* Ah! I DID see a car leaving the city at
breakneck speed around the time of the robbery.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0037
rows.name:
It left through the east gate. *fsssh* ...And the more I
think on it, the more suspicious it seems in retrospect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0038
rows.name:
Sorry, but could I ask you to check that out?
There's a chance it'll turn up some kind of clue. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0039
rows.name:
You're just going to believe his lies? Pffffffft. Okay, bud.
You wanna chase imaginary cars, be my guest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0040
rows.name:
I'll have him coughing up that stolen jewel way before
you're back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0041
rows.name:
I guess if he promises to cooperate after you grant him
this last request, why not? It'll make things easier in the
long run.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0042
rows.name:
And then after I take him in, I'll be counting on you to
give another testimony like before![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0043
rows.name:
Back from your wild goose-chase?
And let me guess—no bad guy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0044
rows.name:
...Wait, what? Hey, that's the stolen jewel!
But how do YOU have it?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0045
rows.name: ...You found it in a suspicious car like he said?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0046
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0047
rows.name:
Huh. I guess whoever it was fled the city and wound
up getting caught by indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0048
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0049
rows.name: Let me guess—no phantom car?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0050
rows.name:
Well, it was generous of you to check it out.
Now it's time to put this masked madman in chains![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0051
rows.name:
...Wait, what? Hey, that's the stolen jewel!
But how do YOU have it?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0052
rows.name: ...You found it in a suspicious car like he said?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0053
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0054
rows.name:
Huh. I guess whoever it was fled the city and wound
up getting caught by indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0055
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0056
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060902_MSG0057
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]
